channel.title: Compile
channel.description: Ok i can code all the items, chars all that stuff but its been a long time since ive done this so i need reminding on exactly how/where or what i need to do for my compiler/run server. i have sources but have forgotten how to run my server, there is a ready made *run*, and a ready made *build* but all they do is either flash up or give me a cannot be recognized error. i was hoping for a new perfect compiler link or something like that, anything would help. a detailed explanation of what to do would be so amazing, cheers. :D

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @killoplish killoplish
item.description:
@killoplish wrote:

Yeah that’s great thanks, is it completely necessary to have jdk? cos mine says its jre6, i can access jdk if necessary

Read full topic

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Basically, right click ur “build” or “run” (im guessin ur usin 317? If not i don’t no if this will work.) now u will see this jdk "java version" Now, it doesn’t rocognize anythingbecause it can’t find your java.

Now go to C:\Program Files\Java (usally that dictionary) and you will see ur java version, for example mine is jdk1.6.0_07

Now when u have ur jdk version, for back to your compiler/run server/build bat files right click and edit the jdk value on the script to ur jdk value found in C drive.

Hope this help,
Johno

Read full topic
